segments.text: That dress is very pretty . Why don ’ t you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We ’ Ve been looking around for many hours.What on earth are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you know , those styles or colors don ’ t suit me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to buy a V-neck checked sweater , and it should be tight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see.How about the color ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know a shop selling this kind of sweaters .
segments.speaker: S1
